properties.areaDesc: Tallapoosa, AL; Chambers, AL; Elmore, AL; Randolph, AL; Macon, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 11:52PM CST until February 20 at 12:42AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Tallapoosa River At Wadley Affecting Chambers...Elmore...Macon...
Randolph and Tallapoosa Counties.

.Heavy rainfall of 2 to 3 inches has occurred on Tuesday over
the Tallapoosa River basin...and a flood warning is now in effect for
the Tallapoosa River at Wadley.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Tallapoosa River At Wadley.
* until late Wednesday night...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 11:00 PM Tuesday The stage Was 13.1 feet.
* Flood stage is 13.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 14.0 feet
toward Wednesday morning. The river will fall below flood stage
during early Wednesday afternoon .
* Impact...At 13.0 feet...Flooding of pasture lands in the area occurs
and cattle and farm equipment should be moved to higher ground if
higher stages are forecast.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Wednesday morning...or sooner
if conditions warrant.
